plural.one: You have pushed the button one time.
plural.other: You have pushed the button {} times.

true_false_description: We invite you to take a quick quiz. Just choose «True» or «False». Once completed, you will be able to see the correct answers on the results screen.
one_answer_description: We invite you to take a short quiz. First, choose an answer, then click the «Tap to validate answer» button. Once completed, you will be able to see the correct answers on the results screen.
you_will_lose: If you exit now, you will lose all progress
